channel.title: Working with Worksheets in Aspose.Cells on Aspose.Cells Product Family
channel.description: Recent content in Working with Worksheets in Aspose.Cells on Aspose.Cells Product Family

item.title: Save Each Worksheet to Different PDF
item.description: Aspose.Cells - Save Each Worksheet to Different PDF Aspose.Cells supports converting XLS files (that contain images, charts etc.) to PDF documents. Aspose.Cells for .NET can work independently to convert a spreadsheet to Pdf document and you do not need to use Aspose.Pdf for .NET for the conversion any longer. The conversion does not require to create / use any temporary file(s) too as the whole process can be done in the memory.

item.title: Set Worksheet Tab Color in Aspose.Cells
item.description: Aspose.Cells - Set Worksheet Tab Color Aspose.Cells allows you to change the color of individual worksheet tabs to make them prominent from the rest. For example, you can make Expenses red, Sales green, Assets blue, etc. Setting Worksheet Tab Color with Microsoft Excel Right-click a tab in the tab-sheet at the bottom of the current worksheet. Select Tab color. Select a color from the palette. Click OK. C#
